messages.title: STOP Heathrow Expansion
messages.content: Since the last election, senior Conservatives have been pushing for new runways at Heathrow airport despite warm words from Tory Zac Goldsmith that he would not let his party go back on this issue. It has been left to the Liberal Democrats to STOP the Tories from pressing ahead with Heathrow expansion. Robin Meltzer said: "We stopped it happening this time and we will block it again More runways here would be a noise pollution disaster and an environmental outrage."

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Opposition to new runways at Heathrow Airport to prevent noise pollution and environmental damage.

issues.environment: Opposition to Heathrow expansion due to potential noise pollution and environmental impact.

leaflet.personalStatement: Robin would be an exceptional MP.

endorsements.endorsement: Robin would be an exceptional MP.

quotes.text: Robin campaigns tirelessly for the whole community.

images.caption: Robin Meltzer and Lib Dems STOP Heathrow Expansion
